code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Welcome(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[computerPlayer,setComputerPlayer]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const enterGame=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(name.trim()!==""&&computerPlayer.trim()!=""){navigate("/welcome?name=".concat(encodeURIComponent(name),"&computerPlayer=").concat(computerPlayer));}};const instructionsPage=e=>{navigate("/instructions");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to Our Mancala Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"welcomebuttons",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"instructionsbutton",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:instructionsPage,children:"Instructions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:enterGame,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Enter your name: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>setComputerPlayer("Default"),type:"submit",children:"Play with Default Player"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>setComputerPlayer("AI"),type:"submit",children:"Play with AI Player"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]})})]});}export default Welcome;
